Description.Text: The hotel is conveniently situated in the town of Secunda, Mpumalanga in South Africa (a malaria-free area). Johannesburg is about 125 km from the hotel. The nearest airports are Hoedspruit (around 380 km), Nelspruit (around 280 km) and OR Tambo International (around 125 km away).

The hotel features classic rooms, deluxe rooms, junior suites, a presidential suite and special assistance rooms. Smoking and non-smoking rooms are available. The rooms incorporate all the facilities demanded by today's discerning traveller, and are all en suite with bath, shower and hairdryer. Amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, radio, WLAN Internet access, safe, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Individually regulated air conditioning features as standard.

Offering elegance, style and grace, this city hotel has a total of 98 rooms and suites, all featuring panoramic views over the golf course or pool terrace. The dÃ©cor and furnishings offer traditional elegance and allow the stylish Victorian-American theme to continue from the grand foyer right into the guest rooms. Facilities at this air-conditioned casino resort include a lobby, auditorium, kids' club, conference facilities, 24-hour room service and secure parking.
